einvoice.conf package

Submodules

einvoice.conf.config_tool module

The classes and functions which support programatic configuration updates.

The configuration values are stored in a dictionary written to a JSON file. The values are read on demand by other package and module files as necessary. This allows for the programtic maintenance of the file.

Args: str ei_conf_fn: the file name containing the values to load. This is filename can be dynamiclaly saved to support multiple versions.

Attributes: None

Raises: None

Returns: None

class einvoice.conf.config_tool.EInvoiceConfig[source]

Bases: object

Configure default settings for e-Invoice.

This class creates some baseline configurations for e-Invoice handling.py

Attributes: defaults: obj This is a dictionary {} object to hold config key/value pairs f_n: str filename which represents both output path and filename

Raises: NA

Return: NA
